title: ...Ready for it?
lyrics: Knew he was a killer first time that I saw him<BREAKER>Wonder how many girls he had loved and left haunted<BREAKER>But if he's a ghost, then I can be a phantom<BREAKER>Holdin' him for ransom

Some, some boys are tryin' too hard<BREAKER>He don't try at all, though<BREAKER>Younger than my exes but he act like such a man, so<BREAKER>I see nothing better, I keep him forever<BREAKER>Like a vendetta-ta
I-I-I see how this is gon' go<BREAKER>Touch me and you'll never be alone<BREAKER>I-Island breeze and lights down low<BREAKER>No one has to know

In the middle of the night, in my dreams (my dreams)<BREAKER>You should see the things we do (we do), baby (baby, mmm, eh)<BREAKER>In the middle of the night, in my dreams (my dreams)<BREAKER>I know I'm gonna be with you<BREAKER>So I take my time (eh)<BREAKER>In the middle of the night

Baby, let the games begin<BREAKER>Let the games begin<BREAKER>Let the games begin<BREAKER>Are you ready for it?<BREAKER>Baby, let the games begin<BREAKER>Let the games begin<BREAKER>Let the games begin<BREAKER>Are you ready for it?
